channel.title: [Project Insanity] Perfect Col and Shad combinations
channel.description:
Okay I am only doing this because I have seen loads of people complaining about yell colors so here is a website with Correct Hexadecimal values.
http://www.mathsisfun.com/hexadecimal-decimal-colors.html - The site has every color in hexadecimal format.
Example we will look at the color blue the code for blue would be "0000FF" That is the html color and most likely won't work with your Project Insanity or 317 server. Instead we would use "255"
So for example "<col=255><shad=0>[TEXT]" That would be Blue and White text. Hope this helped.

item.title: [Project Insanity] Perfect Col and Shad combinations

@RandQm wrote:

Another one wtf, color shit has been posted like 5 times past weeks.
Cmon now one needs this everyone knows how to type in the google search bar.
